author: cms-tsg-storm
body:
This PR is an update of the HLT menus.
The GRun menu has been almost completely cleaned up, as asked by the Trigger Coordination.

Other minor changes:
- a fix in HLTrigger/Configuration/python/CustomConfigs.py about L1REPACK
- add a feature to download a specific menu in HLTrigger/Configuration/test/cmsDriver.csh
title: Update of HLT menus (91X)
